{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = WPEA-352ACN.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = 802.11ac Mini PCIe Module |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.sparklan.com/product/wpea-352acn/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = SparkLAN_WPEA-352ACN |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = SparkLAN |model = WPEA-352ACN |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 28, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/SparkLAN_WPEA-352ACN |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = Mini Card
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = RYK-WPEA352ACN |icid = 6158A-WPEA352ACN |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0E:8E
|chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |802.11n = 450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/17/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== :‧ Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880-BR4A :‧ Standard: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (3T3R) :‧ Data rate up to 1.3Gbps (VHT MCS9) :‧ Support 20/40/80MHz and 256-QAM :‧ Antenna: 3x U.FL connectors :‧ Enhanced wireless security: WEP, WPA, WPA2, 802.1x :‧ Host interface: Mini PCI-E, support Linux
[[Category:English Documentation]]
